Definition of the variable: ID identifies each unique festival
Data Source: ID was assigned
Coding: text data

Definition of the variable: unique name of a festival
Data Source: name is taken from a source used (IMDb and/or survey)
Coding: name is taken from a source used (IMDb and/or survey)

Definition of the variable: English name of country where the festival takes place
Data Source: data are taken from a source used (IMDb and/or survey) and web search
Coding: Coded and standardized country name based on the original data in the source

Definition of the variable: English name of country where the festival takes place, if more than one location is possible
Data Source: data are taken from a source used (IMDb and/or survey) and web search
Coding: Coded and standardized country name based on the original data in the source

Definition of the variable: English name of country where the festival takes place, if more than one location is possible
Data Source: data are taken from a source used (IMDb and/or survey) and web search
Coding: Coded and standardized country name based on the original data in the source

Definition of the variable: English name of country where the festival takes place, if more than one location is possible

Coding: Coded and standardized country name based on the original data in the source

Definition of the variable: English name of country where the festival takes place, if more than one location is possible
Data Source: data are taken from a source used (IMDb and/or survey) and web search
Coding: Coded and standardized country name based on the original data in the source

Definition of the variable: Indicator if a country where festival takes place in a given year belongs to a certain region based on https://datahelpdesk.worldbank.org/knowledgebase/articles/906519-world-bank-country-and-lending-groups
Data Source: data are taken from a source used (IMDb and/or survey) and web search
Coding: Coded and standardized country name based on the original data in the source
Value ranges: , Europe, Latin America and Caribbean, MENA, North America, Oceania, Subsaharan Africa

Definition of the variable: city where the festival takes place
Data Source: data are taken from a source used (IMDb and/or survey) and web search
Coding: city name (not standardized, as reported in a source)

Definition of the variable: second (if more than one location) where the festival takes place
Data Source: data are taken from a source used (IMDb and/or survey) and web search
Coding: city name (not standardized, as reported in a source)

Definition of the variable: month, when the festival usually takes place (if it lasts for two months, the first month)
Data Source: data are taken from a source used (IMDb and/or survey) and web search
Coding: month, when the festival usually takes place (for most edditions in the dataset)
Source of missing values: no information on month is available

Definition of the variable: variable that indicates if a festival is listed in at least 20 % of the sources collected within the BMBF project
Data Source: variable that indicates if a festival is listed in at least 20 % of the sources collected within the BMBF project
Coding: lower than 20 percent - if a festival is listed in less than 20 % of the sources, at least 20 percent - if a festival is listed in at least 20 % of the sources or more
Value ranges: lower than 20 percent, at least 20 percent

Definition of the variable: variable that indicates accreditation of a festival by FIAPF
Data Source: variable that indicates accreditation of a festival by FIAPF
Coding: categories used by FIAPF
Value ranges: competitive film festival, competitive specialised film festival, documentary and short film festival, non-competitive film festival, no fiapf accreditation

Definition of the variable: Variable that indicates accreditation by BAFTA
Data Source: variable that indicates accreditation of a festival by BAFTA
Coding: 1 - festival accredited by BAFTA, 0 - festival is not accredited by BAFTA

Definition of the variable: Variable that indicates accreditation by Academy Awards
Data Source: variable that indicates accreditation of a festival by Academy Awards
Coding: 1 - festival accredited by Academy Awards, 0 - festival is not accredited by Academy Awards

Definition of the variable: foundation year of the festival
Data Source: identified with the help of the web search within 2019-2022
Coding: numeric data
Source of missing values: no data on foundation year was identified

Definition of the variable: variable indicates, if the main source is not a festival website or other additional web sources were used
Data Source: variable indicates, if the main source is not a festival website or other additional web sources were used
Coding: text data
Source of missing values: only a festival website as a source was used

Definition of the variable: variable indicates, if search on the web could not confirm that the festival still exists
Data Source: variable indicates, if search on the web could not confirm that the festival still exists as of 2022
Coding: 1 - no data on still existing was found on the web, 0 - festival might exist as of 2022 (have further editions)

Definition of the variable: if a festival no longer exists, the last year edition
Data Source: identified with the help of the web search within 2019-2022
Coding: if a festival no longer exists and there is data on the last edition, values include the year, otherwise - NA
Source of missing values: no data on foundation year was identified

Definition of the variable: indicator if a festival could not be identified on the web based on the provided information such as title, location, and date (e.g., several festivals fit the description )
Data Source: identified with the help of the web search within 2019-2022
Coding: 1 - cannot be identified on the web, 0 - was identified on the web

Definition of the variable: indicator if a festival could not be found on the web based on the provided information such as title, location, and date (e.g., it might be that the festival is so small that it is not visible online)
Data Source: identified with the help of the web search within 2019-2022
Coding: 1 - was not found on the web, 0 - was found on the web
